name: NexusChapter2
description: The full version of the Nexus game is now at your fingertips Download it on January 26, 2022 and share it with your friends The game is in its second and complete version After we released the first game a year ago, it wasn't entirely up to It Today, we are back with a great game with high quality graphic Its events revolve around a world that has arisen due to a glitch in reality that led to your transition to this world and the presence of monsters and unknown people trying to kill you and your interest in these areas begins and with updates your journey begins
